topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1: Selecting a Region and Project

section.p: Note: For HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade version 2.1, you can work only in regionone. You cannot switch to the denver region. Please disregard this topic.
When working in HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade, you can work in one of the following regions:

ul.li:
the KVM Region, called regionone;
Note: In addition, for Sacramento deployments only, the baremetal region

section.p: In the Horizon interface, you can use a selector to move between the two regions.
For more information on the regions, see the Technical Overview.
Within each region, there are one or more project (tenants). You can use the selector to move between projects.
